Thanks for watching ! :)


= Documentation =

namespace server.webservices.nuages;

/*
 * The ressources given by the web service
 */ 
interface NuageService
{
	// GET /images application/xml
	// Returns full catalogue informations in XML format
	public String getCatalogue();

	// GET /images?number={number:int} image/jpeg
	// Returns asked image
	public File getImage(int number);

	// GET /findShapes?image={number:int}&xStart={xStart:int}&yStart={yStart:int}&xEnd={xEnd:int}&yEnd={yEnd:int} archive/zip
	// Returns the processed images with Google results
	public File findShapes(int number, int xStart, int yStart, int xEnd, int yEnd);
}
